summary: Adds Squirrels in the world of Skyrim: Wild, Companions, Mounts, Armies of agressive squirrels ! ...
descriptionHtml:
[b][i]Adds Squirrels in the world of Skyrim: Wild, Companions, Mounts, Armies of agressive squirrels [/i][/b]! ... No DLC needed

[url=https://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18051107093616616015708658.jpg][img]https://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/05/11//18051107093616616015708658.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b]WILD SQUIRRELS [/b] [/color]

118 animals (« Grey Squirrels » ; « Red Squirrels » ; « Squirrels ») in the following locations :

Pelagia Farm - Snow Shod Farm - Merryfair Farm - Hearthwood Mill - Riften Stables - Mixwater Mill - Brandy Mug Farm - Hlallu Farm - Hoollyfrost Farm - Anga's Mill - Katla’s Farm - Solitude Sawmill - Salvius Farm – Markath Stables – Half Moon Mill – Sarethi Farm - Loreius Farm – Froki's Shack - Alchemist's Shack - Pinewatch - Hunter's Rest - Cliffside retreat - Meeko's Shack – Abandoned Shack – Hall of the Vigilant – Drelas’Cottage

[color=#ff0000][b]COMPANIONS [/b] [/color]

[i][b]Near the Anise's Cabin (near Riverwood), not very far of my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87326/?] Khajiit's Family House[/url], you have Two Squirrels Companions ( with the Dialog Box: Follow - Wait - Favor - Trade - Dismiss) and a Chest with books to conjure the Squirrels. You have also Scrolls to constituate Armies of Squirrels, and 2 Books/Spells to mount Giant Squirrels ! ...[/b][/i]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/IOnnE8sl.jpg[/img]

You can only have one follower at a time: if you want a different one, you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If you have any problem with the dialog box, or if telling the follower to return at home doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With Amazing Follower Tweaks , or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel

[img]https://i.imgur.com/7YPYsRVl.jpg[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b] ARMIES [/b][/color] (Warning: Very very agressive squirrels !)


This mod adds the ability to quickly create hordes of creatures (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !) that are following you as if you were their mother !

To obtain these squirrels, simply buy scrolls found with some Merchants in [color=#ff8c00] Riverwood [/color]: [i] Lucan Valerius, Orgnar in the Sleeping Giant Inn[/i], [i] Alvor[/i]). Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into creatures. The creatures follow you.

In order to find the scrolls at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/2jWnS6h.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b] SUMMONABLE MOUNTS[/b][/color]

Two summonable mounts with 2 Books/Spells in the Chest

[img]https://i.imgur.com/MEwnzGt.gif[/img]

[b][i]Presentation of this mod (XBOX version)[/i]:[/b]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]9TQ9wMOs3xU[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[color=#ff0000][b]CREDITS [/b] [/color]

[color=#ff0000]Mihail Romanov [/color] for the Squirrel in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88992] Squirrels- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons- rodents - ESO) [/url] (fixed version by edherpington)

[color=#ff0000]elafrosicky [/color] for the texture of the « Squirrell »in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89024?] Squirrel Retexture Brown [/url]

Free sounds : [url=http://www.universal-soundbank.com/] universal-soundbank[/url] - [url=http://www.sound-fishing.net/bruitages_animaux.html] Sound Fishing [/url] - [url=http://lasonotheque.org/] lasonotheque [/url] - [url=http://soundbible.com/] soundbible [/url] - [url=http://www.freesfx.co.uk] freesfx [/url] - [url=http://www.xeno-canto.org/]xeno-canto[/url]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]DZyYHJJWD74 [/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-
